mapper.update: update function_gives_grade set project_id = #{projectId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, grade = #{grade,jdbcType=INTEGER}, acceptance_time = #{acceptanceTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, project_type = #{projectType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, operator_name = #{operatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, project_id, grade, acceptance_time, project_type, operator_name from function_gives_grade
